revised_title: Dynamic Decohesion Criterion for Subsonic Fracture of Bimaterial Interfaces
tldr: The authors conducted an experimental study on dynamic decohesion of bimaterial systems with a large material property mismatch, such as PMMA-steel and PMMA-aluminium. They used high-speed interferometric measurements and observed very high crack propagation speeds and high accelerations. A dynamic crack growth criterion for crack growth along bimaterial interfaces is proposed, which is valid in the subsonic regime of crack growth.
